title: Beninos Mens Slim Fit Solid Point Collar Button Down Dress Shirt
description: Point collar, regular cuff, pocket at chest.
In theory, this collar fits all face shapes, so it's the most common and safe shirt.
Regular sleeve type, two buttons, can adjust cuff tightness according to wrist thickness.
Features: button-front dress shirt, solid color. Usually with a jacket, tie and a suit or formalwear, but this shirts are also worn casually too.
